channel.title: Save On Bvlgari 4058B | BV 4058B Limited Edition Frames
channel.description: Bvlgari was founded by a Greek jeweller from Epirus named Sotirios Voulgaris at the end of the 19th century. The name Bvlgari is the Italian translation of his name; Sotirio Bulgari. The ‘v’ is actually a Latin ‘u’, used to show the company’s Roman influence. Voulgaris, or Bulgari as he is more commonly known, had [...]
